edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.deck.controllers

Class GetDeckController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.deck.controllers.GetDeckController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GetDeckController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Used in order to get the deckss off of the database. This is used to fill the DeckModel from the database on build The first call of this method is inside of the DeckTree on paint method This is done in order to prevent trying get the data before the network has been instantiated.
    Author:
    Andrew Busch

      Add the given Decks to the local model (they were received from the core).

      • receivedDecks

        public void receivedDecks(Deck[] decks)
        Add the given Decks to the local model (they were received from the core). This method is called by the GetDeckRequestObserver
        Parameters:
        decks - an array of Decks received from the server
